    • getWinnerTeam

      public TeamEnum getWinnerTeam()

    • checkInstantWinner

      public TeamEnum checkInstantWinner()
      Check if a team has won. This method must be called after any tower or island update is detected
      You win if you put all towers on islands or if there are too few island groups and you meet the remaining winning criteria
      Returns:
      the winner team if it exists or NOTEAM if nobody won

    • checkDeferredWinner

      public TeamEnum checkDeferredWinner()
      The game is won if when the game ends you have placed more towers than the other teams.
      The game is won if when the game ends there is no player who built more towers than the other players AND you have more professors than others.
      If both conditions are equal, the white team wins
      Returns:
      true if there is a winner

    • morePlacedTowers

      private TeamEnum morePlacedTowers()
      Checks which team has the most towers placed
      Returns:
      the team with the most towers put on islands

    • moreProfessors

      private TeamEnum moreProfessors()
      Checks which team controls the most professors
      Returns:
      The team with the most professors controlled
